title: CSV Content Analyzer
description: Upload any CSV file to automatically analyze its structure, content, and purpose using AI

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Upload CSV file and display AI-generated analysis of its content and purpose

interactions: Drag-and-drop or click to upload CSV file
Auto-trigger AI analysis after file upload
Display AI-generated summary of CSV purpose
Show first 10 rows in interactive table
List detected column types and patterns
Suggest potential use cases for the data
acceptance_criteria: Accept any CSV format without predefined schema
Show data preview with correct column headers
Store last 5 analyses in local storage
